subject: This sucks....
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
Looks like according to the FAQ page at digitaldowsing.com that Mr. 
Chapelle will shutting down production at the end of the year. I 
understand that he is bogged down pumping out products instead of 
personal research, but it still sucks to think that there won't be 
anymore cool products. I better get those speakjet kits while I can.

Andy
